mapper.select: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, T.* from board T,(select @rownum := 0)tmp order by num DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (name, title, content, created_date, modified_date) VALUES (#{name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createdDate}, #{modifiedDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content} WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT num, name, title, content, created_date, modified_date FROM board ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{amount}
